channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is OpenAI Shifting Focus From Purpose To Profit?
item.description: When a company transitions from purpose to profit, people and planet-oriented priorities tend to fall short. Does it have to be that way?

item.title: Unintended consequences

item.title: Amazon Killed Remote Work. Is RTO The New Normal?
item.description: Recently, the number of companies eliminating flexible work policies is increasing. Now, return to work policies appear to be the new normal.

item.title: Social Media Could Make Election Anxiety Worse Than Ever
item.description: The current election cycle could be the perfect time for a person to implement a self-imposed 'digital detox'
